snippet: American peace activists, many of them from the group Codepink, are among those in a Pakistani convoy trying to reach the tribal area of South Waziristan. They are protesting the U.S. campaign of drone strikes against Taliban fighters and other...
abstract: American peace activists, many of them from the group Codepink, are among those in a Pakistani convoy trying to reach the tribal area of South Waziristan. They are protesting the U.S. campaign of drone strikes against Taliban fighters and other militants, attacks that a senior American diplomat acknowledged have caused civilian deaths.

headline.main: Western Peace Activists Protest in Pakistan Against Drone Strikes
